mob.name: Rock
mob.description: A rock. It doesn't do much.
mob.overriddenSpawnMessage: Something mountain-like appears in the distance...

mob.name: Cactus
mob.overriddenSpawnMessage: A tower of thorns rises from the sands...

mob.name: Baby Ant
mob.description: Weak and defenseless, but big dreams.

mob.name: Worker Ant
mob.description: It's a bit temperamental, probably from working all the time.

mob.name: Soldier Ant
mob.description: It's got wings and it's ready to use them.

mob.name: Queen Ant
mob.description: You must have done something really bad if she's chasing you.

mob.name: Ant Hole
mob.description: Ants go in, and come out. Can't explain that.

mob.name: Beetle
mob.description: It's hungry and flowers are its favorite meal.

mob.name: Hornet
mob.description: These aren't quite as nice as the little bees.
mob.overriddenSpawnMessage: A big yellow spot shows up in the distance...

mob.name: Centipede
mob.description: It's just there doing its thing.

mob.name: Centipede
mob.description: It's just there doing its thing.

mob.name: Dark Ladybug
mob.description: Cute and harmless... if left unprovoked.

mob.name: Jellyfish
mob.overriddenSpawnMessage: You hear lightning strikes coming from a far distance...

mob.name: Ant Egg
mob.description: Not yet an ant but perhaps soon.

mob.name: Fire Ant Egg
mob.description: This ant is not yet on fire.

mob.name: Fly
mob.overriddenSpawnMessage: A buzzing noise echoes through the sewer tunnels

mob.name: Leafbug
mob.description: It's not a leaf, but it is a bug.

mob.name: Mantis
mob.description: You better pray you don't become dinner.

mob.name: Baby Termite
mob.description: Weak and defenseless, but big dreams.<n/>These creatures appear to be connected somehow.

mob.name: Worker Termite
mob.description: It's a bit temperamental, probably from working all the time.<n/>These creatures appear to be connected somehow.

mob.name: Soldier Termite
mob.description: It's got wings and it's ready to use them.<n/>These creatures appear to be connected somehow.

mob.name: Termite Mound
mob.description: Termites go in, and come out. Can't explain that.

mob.name: Termite Egg
mob.description: Not yet a termite but perhaps soon.

mob.name: Roach
mob.description: Gotta go FAST... until they get tired.

mob.name: Firefly
mob.overriddenSpawnMessage: There's a bright light in the horizon...

mob.name: Hel Beetle
mob.description: Scourge that spawns in the other plane.
mob.overriddenSpawnMessage: You sense ominous vibrations coming from a different realm...

mob.name: Target Dummy
mob.description: How do you have this in your gallery?

mob.name: Hel Spider
mob.description: Scourge that spawns in the other plane.
mob.overriddenSpawnMessage: You sense ominous vibrations coming from a different realm...

mob.name: Hel Centipede
mob.description: Scourge that spawns in the other plane.
mob.overriddenSpawnMessage: You sense ominous vibrations coming from a different realm...

mob.name: Hel Centipede
mob.description: Scourge that spawns in the other plane.
mob.overriddenSpawnMessage: You sense ominous vibrations coming from a different realm...

mob.name: Hel Wasp
mob.description: Scourge that spawns in the other plane.
mob.overriddenSpawnMessage: You sense ominous vibrations coming from a different realm...

mob.name: Gambler
mob.overriddenSpawnMessage: You hear someone whisper faintly... "just... one more game..."

mob.name: Magic Firefly
mob.description: There's something magical about this one.

mob.name: Nazar Beetle
mob.description: This one has a different pattern... what does that mean?

petal.name: Basic
petal.description: A nice petal, not too strong but not too weak.

petal.name: Light
petal.description: Weaker than most petals, but recharges very quickly.

petal.name: Rock
petal.description: Extremely durable, but takes a bit longer to recharge.

petal.name: Square
petal.description: This shape... it looks familiar...

petal.name: Rose
petal.description: Its healing properties are amazing. Not so good at combat though.

petal.name: Stinger
petal.description: It really hurts, but it's very fragile.

petal.name: Iris
petal.description: Very poisonous, but takes a little while to do its work.

petal.name: Wing
petal.description: It comes and goes.

petal.name: Missile
petal.description: You can actually shoot this one.

petal.name: Grapes
petal.description: It goes poof. Now with a secret ingredient: poison.

petal.name: Cactus
petal.description: Not very strong, but somehow increases your maximum health.

petal.name: Faster
petal.description: It's so light it makes your other petals spin faster.

petal.name: Bubble
petal.description: Physics are for the weak.

petal.name: Pollen
petal.description: Asthmatics beware.

petal.name: Dandelion
petal.description: Its interesting properties inhibits healing effects on affected units.<n/>Affected units have their healing reduced by 20%. Stacks with itself.

petal.name: Beetle Egg
petal.description: Something interesting might pop out of this.

petal.name: Antennae
petal.description: Allows your flower to sense foes farther away.

petal.name: Heavy
petal.description: This thing is so heavy that nothing gets in the way.<n/>Slows down petal rotation speed when equipped.

petal.name: Yin Yang
petal.description: This mysterious petal affects the rotation of your petals in unpredictable ways.

petal.name: Web
petal.description: It's really sticky.

petal.name: Honey
petal.description: Mobs love this. Attracts them in a large radius.<n/>Mobs will prioritize this over flowers.<n/>Affected units develop immunity to its effects after some time.

petal.name: Leaf
petal.description: Gathers energy from the sun to heal your flower passively.

petal.name: Salt
petal.description: Reflects some of the damage you take back to the enemy that dealt it.<n/>Higher rarity mobs have higher resistance to damage reflection.

petal.name: Rice
petal.description: Spawns very quickly, but not very strong.

petal.name: Corn
petal.description: Takes a long time to spawn, but has a lot of health.

petal.name: Sand
petal.description: A bunch of sand particles.

petal.name: Pincer
petal.description: Debilitates enemies temporarily, reducing their movement speed.

petal.name: Yucca
petal.description: Heals your flower but only while in the defensive position.

petal.name: Magnet
petal.description: Increases drop pick up range.

petal.name: Yggdrasil
petal.description: A dried leaf from the Yggdrasil tree.<n/>Rumored to be able to bring the fallen back to life.

petal.name: Starfish
petal.description: Increases health regen while below 75% health.

petal.name: Pearl
petal.description: Just drop it off somewhere and use your kinetic powers so you don't lose it.

petal.name: Lightning
petal.description: Strikes several nearby enemies.

petal.name: Jelly
petal.description: No one likes touching this.

petal.name: Claw
petal.description: Deals extra damage if the victim is above 80% health.<n/>-50% damage vs other flowers.

petal.name: Shell
petal.description: Adds a temporary shield to yourself or allies.

petal.name: Cutter
petal.description: A friend used to own this... now it's time for revenge.<n/>Increases body damage.

petal.name: Dahlia
petal.description: A small amount of heal but fairly consistent.

petal.name: Uranium
petal.description: Periodically releases radiation.<n/>-75% damage versus other flowers.<n/>Effect strength depends on distance to petal.

petal.name: Sponge
petal.description: Spreads damage taken by the flower over a period of time.<n/>If destroyed, deals remaining damage all at once.<n/>Does not delay <c val="#ce76db">Poison</c> damage.

petal.name: Soil
petal.description: Increases health, but also increases flower size and decreases movement speed.

petal.name: Fangs
petal.description: Heals based on damage dealt by this petal.

petal.name: Third Eye
petal.description: Allows your flower to expand your petals further out.

petal.name: Peas
petal.description: It goes poof.

petal.name: Mysterious Stick
petal.description: A mysterious stick that summons the forces of the wind.

petal.name: Clover
petal.description: Increases your luck.<n/>Luck is used by specific petals to change their stats.

petal.name: Mysterious Powder
petal.description: Increases movement speed.<n/>Disabled if flower takes damage or if near a mob higher than a certain rarity.

petal.name: Air
petal.description: It's literally nothing.

petal.name: Basil
petal.description: Increases all healing received.

petal.name: Orange
petal.description: A sweet citrus fruit.

petal.name: Ant Egg
petal.description: Something interesting might pop out of this.

petal.name: Poo
petal.description: Makes mobs less likely to want to attack you.

petal.name: Mysterious Relic
petal.description: A strange relic. Significantly increases maximum health.<n/>Damage taken is spread among other wearers.

petal.name: Lotus
petal.description: Absorbs poison damage taken by the flower.

petal.name: Light Bulb
petal.description: A shiny lightbulb. Draws aggro from mobs.

petal.name: Cotton
petal.description: Absorbs damage taken by the flower.

petal.name: Carrot
petal.description: Sturdy and reliable. Can be shot and bounces off walls.

petal.name: Bone
petal.description: Sturdy.

petal.name: Plank
petal.description: Does 20x damage vs projectiles and petals.

petal.name: Tomato
petal.description: Gets stronger over time.

petal.name: Dark Mark
petal.description: A dark mark that binds itself to a fallen soul.

petal.name: Rubber
petal.description: Increases knockback received. Also absorbs lightning damage dealt to the flower.

petal.name: Blood Stinger
petal.description: It really hurts, but it's very fragile.<n/>Deals some of the damage dealt back to the flower.

petal.name: Bur
petal.description: Decreases armor of affected unit. Does not stack with itself.

petal.name: Root
petal.description: Provides additional armor but only while in the defensive position.

petal.name: Ankh
petal.description: An ancient relic.<n/>When destroyed, will teleport the flower back to where it was destroyed.

petal.name: Dice
petal.description: Has a 5% chance of dealing 35x damage.<n/>Chance increases by 4% per point in luck.

petal.name: Talisman of Evasion
petal.description: A necklace that allows the wearer to anticipate enemy attacks.

petal.name: Battery
petal.description: Discharges electricity whenever the flower gets hit.

petal.name: Amulet
petal.description: Converts a percentage of overheal into shields.

petal.name: Compass
petal.description: This crappy thing might be able to find something interesting...

petal.name: Disc
petal.description: Reduces damage taken from collisions with mobs and flowers.

petal.name: Shovel
petal.description: Becomes untargetable but unable to use petals for a limited time.

petal.name: Coin
petal.description: The power of capitalism compels you!

petal.name: Poker Chip
petal.description: ALL IN.

petal.name: Card
petal.description: A playing card. Likely marked.

petal.name: Moon Rock
petal.description: This thing is so big your petals orbit it instead.<n/>Where did you find this anyway?

petal.name: Privet Berry
petal.description: Deals extra <c val="#ce76db">Poison</c> damage based on the existing <c val="#ce76db">Poison</c> damage per second.

petal.name: Glass
petal.description: Phases through enemies.<n/>Cannot damage enemies more often than a certain interval.

petal.name: Corruption
petal.description: Corrupts one's soul, turning them against their own kind.

petal.name: Mana Orb
petal.description: Creates mana.

petal.name: Blueberries
petal.description: It goes poof. Now with the extra secret ingredient: lightning.

petal.name: Magic Cotton
petal.description: Absorbs damage taken by the flower.

petal.name: Magic Stinger
petal.description: It really hurts, but it's very fragile.

petal.name: Magic Leaf
petal.description: Gathers mana from the environment passively.

petal.name: Magic Cactus
petal.description: Increases maximum mana capacity.

petal.name: Magic Eye
petal.description: Consumes half the current mana and deals damage based on that value.

petal.name: Magic Missile
petal.description: You can actually shoot this one... with magic.

petal.name: Magic Stick
petal.description: A mysterious stick that summons the forces of the wind... with magic.

petal.name: Coral
petal.description: Breaks apart on impact.<n/>Each piece has 50% of the stats of the predecessor.

petal.name: Magic Bubble
petal.description: Physics are for the magicless.

petal.name: Nazar Amulet
petal.description: Reduces one damage instance damage by 98%.
